package.name: seneka_remote_control
package.description: The seneka_remote_control package implements a ROS node which acts as an interface to the nodes of the seneka_sensor_node metapackage, developed for the SeNeKa project at Fraunhofer IPA. This package might work with other hardware and can be used for other purposes, however the development has been specifically for this project and the deployed sensors.
package.author: Thorsten Andreas Kannacher
